title: EU Slumber party?
body: So the European servers are getting a slumber party event, what about us over on NA servers? We getting an event too eventually?

replies.body: i swear to god if this is fake im not gonna be too happy -_- i want that sweet DNU skin {{champion:77}}

A slumber party event?  That sounds amazing, though I don't know anything about that.  Each region might have their own events and promotions, so you may see different occasions depending on where you're playing.  If you have any ideas, though, feel free to share it in our [concepts ](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts)boards.  Hope that helps clear things up!
